subject: Chemistry
question_text: Given below are two statements: One is labelled as Assertion A and the other is labelled as Reason R. H 2 Te is more acidic than H 2 S . Reason R: Bond dissociation enthalpy of H 2 Te is lower than H 2 S . In the light of the above statements. Choose the most appropriate from the options given below. options.text: (1) Both A and R are true but R is NOT the correct
